events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because the product is not what I paid for.
The reported issue was identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
The case was assigned to the refund support team to assist with the refund process promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can verify the details?
Sure, I have attached the photo of the incorrect item and here is my order number: 123456789.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount returned to your original payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate your assistance and look forward to receiving the refund.
Your refund has been approved and processed on our end. Please allow up to 7 business days for it to appear on your payment account.
Just following up to confirm you have received the refund for your incorrect order. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund was successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
